question: The reducing agent in the given equations:
<katex>$4~Ag_{(s)}+8~CN^{-}+2H_{2}O+O_{2}\rightarrow4[Ag(CN)_{2}]^{-}+4~OH^{-}$</katex>
<katex>$2[Ag(CN)_{2}]^{-}+Zn_{(s)}\rightarrow[Zn(CN)_{4}]^{2-}+2Ag_{(s)}$</katex>
explanation: Zinc acts as the reducing agent in the second step, displacing Silver from the complex and reducing <katex>$Ag^+$</katex> to <katex>$Ag$</katex>.
